questions.quote: You know why? Because people like to say "salsa." "Excuse me, do you have salsa?" "We need more salsa." "Where is the salsa? No salsa?"

When I see someone enjoying themselves like that, it reminds me why I got into this business in the first place.
Kramer, how is that important? Honestly, do you really think he's gonna ask you that?
What is this 'saving movies' thing? Something's playing, you go.
This is America! I don't have to wear anything I don't want to wear!
I've read your book, Professor, and I was quite intrigued by it.
You had sex with the cleaning woman on your desk? Who are you, how did you do that?
Oh, they've got a cure for cancer. See, it's all big business. Oh hey, Jerry just walked in. Hi, George.  Yeah yeah yeah yeah take my number. 555-8643. Okay, here he is.
I got down in my knees and went, "Go ahead, Mickey. Hit me. I'm begging you, Mickey, please hit me. C'mon, hit me. I love you, Mickey, I love you!"
